description: The Department of National Defence (DND) Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Trenton requires the supply and delivery of Uninterruptable Power Supply (UPS) Batteries to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton in order to update the computers end of life cycle on Canadian Forces Station Canada.
duration_in_months: );//Iam an expert AI assistant. Here is the formatted output in JSON format as requested:\
full_summary:
## Uninterruptable Power Supply (UPS) Batteries Tender
### Announcement

#### Tender Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has released a tender for the supply and delivery of Uninterruptable Power Supply (UPS) Batteries to the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton.

#### Tender Details
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (G and S)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

#### Tender Specifications
* The quantity and specifications of the UPS Batteries to be supplied and delivered
* The bidder must comply with the following UNSPSC codes:
	+ 26110000 - Batteries and generators and kinetic power transmission
	+ 27112750 - Battery powered crimping tool
* The tender description can be found in the attached contract documents

#### Contact Information
* **Bidder Contact:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Bidder Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Bidder Contact:** Malko-Moore, Shamael (SPAC/PSPC) at shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
* The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price Responding to this Notice of Intent is not mandatory; however, your response will help the Government of Canada better understand the market.

#### Amendments to Notice

An amendment has been issued to the original posting date and contact information. Bidders are advised to disregard the original posting deadline and instead follow the new details provided in the amendment.

#### Posting Details

The tender posting is available on Buyandsell.gc.ca and Ariba Discovery. Bidders are advised to follow all instructions provided in the posting carefully. Please be aware that the bidder must comply with all applicable government regulations and laws when submitting their bid.

#### Status of Tender

The tender status is Cancelled due to original tender being announced. Bidders should be aware of this and adjust their submission accordingly. [^1]
 
[^1] The bidder admitted that the initial tender posting was already canceled, so when the rewriting starts, it should be noted that the current status **Tender Status:** **Cancelled
